issue.title: [C++] CountSetBits doesn't ensure 64-bit aligned accesses
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6032](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6032). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If the `data` pointer isn't 64-bit aligned, then `CountSetBits` fails to ensure 64-bit aligned accesses in the 64-bit popcnt loop.
